StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: OncoArray: Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI)

Person.Organization: H. LEE MOFFITT CANCER CTR & RES INSTAMERICAN ASSOCIATION FOR CANCER RESEARCH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Funding support for the Follow-up of Ovarian Cancer Genetic Association and Interaction Studies (FOCI) was provided through the National Cancer Institute’s Cancer Post-GWAS Initiative, Genetic Associations and Mechanisms in Oncology (GAME-ON) (U19-CA148112). The FOCI/Ovarian Cancer Association Consortium (OCAC) Oncoarray genotyping project was funded through grants from the U.S. National Institutes of Health (NIH) (CA1X01HG007491-01, U19-CA148112, R01-CA149429 and R01-CA058598).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Cancer in all age groups, other diseases in adults only, and methods
ConsentGroup.name: CADM
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: The informed consent document signed by the study participants allows use of these data by investigators for discovery and hypothesis generation in the investigation of the genetic contributions to cancer in all age groups and other diseases in adults only, as well as development of novel analytical approaches for GWAS.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast, Colorectal, Endometrial, Melanoma, Ovarian, and/or Prostate Cancer, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BCEMOPCA-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast, Colorectal, Endometrial, Melanoma, Ovarian, and/or Prostate Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Tumors)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVTU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Tumors.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BRCA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (COL)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). The letter of collaboration for this study is the "Aichi Cancer Center Collaborator Agreement Governing Access to, and Use and Disclosure of Data From the HERPACC" from the Aichi Cancer Center. A blank copy can be found at the end of the dataset's Data Use Certification Agreement (see dbGaP study page). Requestor must provide this signed form documenting Aichi Cancer Center approval. Contact HERPACC/Dr. Keitaro Matsuo (kmatsuo@aichi-cc.jp) to set up collaborative agreement.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (PUB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-PUB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast, Ovarian, or Endometrial Disease, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BOED-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast, Ovarian, or Endometrial Disease. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Ovarian Cancer Only
ConsentGroup.name: OVCA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is restricted to ovarian cancer studies only. General methods development research is NOT permitted

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast and Ovarian cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BROC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Breast and Ovarian cancer.
Data can NOT be used for general methods development research

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
General methods development research is NOT permitted. Data is NOT available for genetic research on non-cancer and/or non-disease traits (e.g. intelligence, behavioral traits). Data is available for cancer research relating to population structure (including research that may have applications or implications for the understanding of ancestral history, because of the information it may provide about allele frequencies in difference populations).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Ovarian Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OVCA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Ovarian Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.
